item.title: A curious claim about Advertising's effect on Google
item.description: h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 h6 italic This might be bold inline *bold underscore underscoredouble this is a short quote this is code This might be code inline This is a longer bit of code This might be a linked heading Note: This article is presented in short form and long form in that order. Feel free to read whichever version you prefer. Google, is it worse now? [short form] In a recently published Freakanomics episode about the perceived quality degradation of Google Search, Marissa Mayer makes a claim that ads made Google a more enjoyable product to Google users.
